text: 11|70|avarkaḷuṭaiya kaikaḷ ataṉiṭam cellātataik kaṇṭatum avarkaḷaip paṟṟi cantēkittār; avarkaḷaip paṟṟiya payamum avar maṉatil ūcalāṭiyatu. (Appoḻutu) avarkaḷ (ipṟāhīmai nōkki) ‘‘nīr payappaṭātīr. Niccayamāka nāṅkaḷ ‘lūt'tuṭaiya makkaḷiṭam (avarkaḷai aḻittuviṭa) aṉuppappaṭṭuḷḷōm'' eṉṟu kūṟiṉārkaḷ
